short_description: The legendary fighting franchise returns! Master classic and new characters, explore dynamic single-player modes, and battle rivals worldwide in Street Fighter 6.
Bounty hunt in the Louisiana bayou, 1896. Track terrifying monsters with your partner, kill them for the prize, and survive the deadly hunters after your blood.
Explore a vibrant, post-apocalyptic world in Wuthering Waves, a story-rich action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals. Unravel mysteries and fight for survival!
Experience realistic Cold War combat in Arma Reforger. Fight for US or Soviet forces on Everon island in this stepping stone to Arma 4.
Scavenge abandoned moons for scraps in a co-op horror game. Meet your quota or become permanent company. Beware the lurking horrors!
Escape a brutal, immersive warzone in Arena Breakout: Infinite. Loot, shoot, and extract to survive in this hyper-realistic, tactical FPS.
Dive into New Eridu, a vibrant city resisting the otherworldly Hollows in Zenless Zone Zero! Fast-paced action and stylish characters await.
Survive the dinosaur-infested island of ARK in this Unreal Engine 5 remake! Tame creatures, build bases, and uncover the mysteries of the ARK in this open-world adventure.
Shape humanity's destiny! Lead a civilization from humble beginnings to a global superpower in Sid Meier's Civilization VII. Build, explore, and conquer across history.
SMITE 2 is the Unreal Engine 5-powered sequel to the popular MOBA. Experience improved graphics, refined gameplay, and all-new strategies with your favorite gods!
Explore a dynamic open world in Throne and Liberty, where strategic combat and player choices shape the outcome of epic battles for power and freedom.
Survive in a decaying realm, battling corrupted creatures and uncovering secrets hidden within the Shroud. Build, craft, and fight to reclaim your world in this survival action RPG.
Explore an abandoned toy factory in Poppy Playtime, solving puzzles and evading terrifying, sentient toys in this horror adventure. Uncover the dark secrets within!
In this co-op adventure, a couple on the brink of divorce is magically turned into dolls. They must work together to overcome fantastical challenges and repair their broken relationship.
Experience the epic battles of the Three Kingdoms like never before! A massive, single map and overwhelming enemy forces await in this reimagining of the DW series.
Experience hockey like never before in NHL 25! Revolutionized gameplay, authentic arenas, and the deepest modes yet make this the ultimate hockey experience.
Balatro is a roguelike deckbuilder where you play illegal poker hands. Combine strategic cardplay with powerful jokers to create insane combos and win big.
Explore a vibrant, stylized world in MiSide! Solve puzzles, collect unique items, and unravel a heartwarming story about friendship and self-discovery.
Become the hero in a fantastical kingdom! Forge bonds, battle monsters, and unravel a royal conspiracy in this vibrant, turn-based RPG.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: Uncover ancient mysteries as Indiana Jones in this globetrotting adventure. Explore lost civilizations, solve puzzles, and thwart Nazi conspiracies in a thrilling first-person journey.
Experience brutal WWII combat in Hell Let Loose. Coordinate with your team in 50v50 battles featuring realistic weapons, vehicles, and tactical gameplay.
Leap into a 3D world as Mario! Explore Princess Peach's castle, collect stars, and rescue her from Bowser in this revolutionary platformer.
Brave the radioactive Zone in this post-apocalyptic FPS. Explore, survive, and uncover the dark secrets of Chornobyl in a brutal, immersive world.
Brave the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone in STALCRAFT: X! Scavenge, craft, fight, and survive against mutants, anomalies, and other players in this post-apocalyptic MMO shooter.
Team up with friends to manage a supermarket in 'Supermarket Together'! Restock shelves, serve customers, and keep the store running smoothly in this chaotic co-op adventure!
Explore a vibrant world inspired by Norse mythology in Ragnarok Online 2. Create unique characters, battle monsters, and embark on epic quests!
Brave terrifying, mind-bending experiments solo or with friends in the Outlast universe. Survival demands trust and sacrifice in this co-op horror experience.
In a near-future Detroit, androids grapple with sentience and freedom. Experience their stories, make choices, and shape a world on the brink of revolution.
EA Sports UFC 2 delivers stunning visuals, realistic fighter likenesses, and a deep career mode for an authentic MMA experience.
Palia is a cozy, free-to-play MMO where you build, farm, and explore a vibrant world alongside friends. Discover mysteries and craft a life together!
Survive the Amazon rainforest in Green Hell! Craft, hunt, and fight your sanity as you battle starvation, predators, and psychological horrors.
Soar through the skies in stunning detail! Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 delivers unparalleled realism with enhanced aircraft, dynamic weather, and exciting new aviation careers.
Assemble a team of champions, strategize your formations, and battle against other players in this auto-battler game of skill and luck.
Explore a vast, procedurally generated universe. Discover unique planets, creatures, and resources. Trade, fight, and survive in an endless journey of exploration and discovery.
Cultivate your dream farm in Farming Simulator 25! New crops, animals, and advanced features bring the ultimate farming experience to life.
Washington D.C. is in ruins. As a Division agent, fight to save the city from collapse in this post-apocalyptic action RPG with deep customization and intense firefights.
Gaming icons clash in the ultimate crossover! Battle as beloved characters from Nintendo and beyond in fast-paced, chaotic, and endlessly customizable combat.
Survive a zombie-infested city using parkour and crafting. Day brings freedom, but night unleashes terrifying Volatiles. Will you make it until dawn?
Fight alongside the Resistance in occupied France as elite sniper Karl Fairburne. Eliminate Nazi threats and sabotage their operations in this thrilling WW2 shooter.
Explore a supernatural 17th-century island in New World: Aeternum. Forge your destiny in a land of danger, magic, and endless adventure.
Explore a cozy island with Hello Kitty and friends! Craft, decorate, solve puzzles, and build friendships in this adorable life-simulation adventure.
Navigate a world of fake news as a news editor in 'The Headliners'. Choose your stories carefully, as each decision impacts society and shapes the future!
Command your tank in intense, realistic WWII battles. Explore a massive arsenal and dominate the battlefield in this thrilling online multiplayer war game.

Descend into a nightmarish roguelike shooter as Isaac, battling grotesque monsters and biblical horrors in a desperate escape from his mother's wrath. Repentance is the ultimate, definitive Binding of Isaac experience.
Brave a post-apocalyptic US ravaged by a cataclysmic event in Exoborne. Use powerful exosuits to survive, explore, and shape a new society in this open-world extraction shooter.
Explore the sprawling state of San Andreas as CJ, navigating gang wars, corrupt cops, and personal struggles in this iconic open-world adventure.
Explore a magical world with Nikki in "Infinity Nikki," a charming open-world dress-up adventure filled with puzzles, quests, and endless fashion possibilities.
Loot, shoot, and vault hunt across a crazy galaxy in Borderlands 3! Play as one of four Vault Hunters and stop the Calypso Twins' fanatical cult.
Forge your legend in Knight Online, a classic MMORPG where you join epic nation battles, conquer dungeons, and rise through the ranks in a world of swords and magic.
Run your own grocery store! Stock shelves, manage cashiers, and satisfy customers in this surprisingly addictive supermarket simulator.
